text: DON'T MISS 'I got this real sense of being with a man for the first time': Katie Price confesses to intimate night with Simon Cowell... after hotly denying claims of a passionate fling 'Him': Perrie Edwards silences split rumours as she CONFIRMS romance with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain in steamy Paris kiss snap 'I am SOOO gay': Kristen Stewart strips off for lesbian tryst on SNL... after 'coming out' in her opening monologue Bianca Gascoigne parties up a storm at CBB wrap party... but is left to push luggage out of hotel the next morning WITHOUT new love Jamie O'Hara 'My fabulous life': Blac Chyna cuddles son King Cairo and daughter Dream as they wear matching pajamas He's hardly aged! Ex Eastender Craig Fairbrass, 53, shows off his buff physique in Barbados twenty years after securing his place as a national heartthrob Big Brother's Lateysha Grace flaunts sizzling curves in skin-tight white mini... yet breast-baring pal spectacularly steals her spotlight at Playboy bash 'It made me realise I need him': CBB winner Coleen Nolan on how her time on the reality show has 'helped to save her marriage to Ray Fensome' Simon Cowell 'rushes to the aid of sick contestant as he collapses on stage' during Britain's Got Talent auditions in Birmingham 'If I'd been on nobody would've turned for me !' Will.i.am says it doesn't matter if contestants can sing. A damning indictment of The Voice UK, by JIM SHELLEY 'You're Danielle Lloyd, not f**king Beyonc√©!' Nicola McLean blasts fellow WAG following the confusion over her attendance at Jamie O'Hara's wedding 'He's disgusting and pathetic': Bianca Gascoigne slams ex CJ Meeks following claims he was 'heartbroken' over CBB romance with Jamie O'Hara 'You look insane after having four children!' Bikini-clad Natasha Hamilton leaves fans awestruck as she flaunts eye-popping six-pack during New Zealand tour Smokin' hot! Victoria's Secret stunner Martha Hunt shows off her fit form as she grabs cigarette break in Florida That's one way to celebrate! Imogen Anthony shares TOPLESS photos from her tropical birthday weekend with radio host boyfriend Kyle Sandilands Kym Marsh flaunts her cleavage in a VERY plunging black dress as she attends charity dinner with Corrie on-screen husband Simon Gregson Red hot! EOTB's Holly Rickwood sizzles in plunging leather catsuit as she is joined by TOWIE's Georgia Harrison for birthday celebrations New body, new man? Jessica Rose, 28, enjoys al fresco workout... after revealing plans to ditch 'wrinkly' ex Nick Knowles, 54, in favour of 'tight, firm' younger man Blanket Jackson looks in good spirits on rare public outing with friends... after sister Paris explosively claimed their father Michael was murdered 'Watching her is making me less intelligent': Pointless viewers despair as Amy Childs botches a ridiculously easy question about crackers on the game show 'It is a reminder of the battle I fought and won': Model Amy Pejkovic shares a harrowing hospital photo from her 2012 brain tumour surgery Nicole Kidman stuns in a beaded dress at Directors Guild of America Awards with Lion filmmaker Garth Davis... and without husband Keith Urban 'She is very happy': Zoe Ball is 'virtually inseparable' from new cameraman beau Billy Yates after split with husband Fatboy Slim You think she'd stay at Paris! Hilton rocks tiny silver dress as she shows off her spinning bed and mirrored ceiling at the Palms in Vegas Is this the end for Ken? Coronation Street legend Barlow 'set to suffer ANOTHER stroke' as fans fear character's days are numbered Mariah Carey, 46, sizzles in skin-tight mini for date with Bryan Tanaka, 33... after burning $250K wedding dress to James Packer in shock new video 'Don't you know who I am?': 'Angry' Kym Marsh has 'huge meltdown' in London hotel 'after being asked for ID' Naomie Harris flashes her taut tummy in a sassy monochrome dress at Santa Barbara International Film Festival alongside demure Ruth Negga Bruce Willis, 61, and wife Emma Heming, 38, share a sweet smooch as they enjoy NYC basketball game Helen Mirren showcases her classic style in a white and silver ensemble for the 69th Annual Directors Guild of America Awards SPOILER ALERT: Troubled EastEnders' couple Lee and Whitney Carter try to put tensions behind them with a romantic Valentine's meal Braless Katie McGlynn looks worlds away from her Corrie character as she flaunts her cleavage in VERY plunging trouser suit during night out RACHEL JOHNSON: David Beckham may be Golden Balls - but his feet are definitely clay If you don't want to feel betrayed, don't read Becks's private emails 'So rude!' Girl befriended by Jack in Titanic reflects on her brief fame... and reveals she STILL gets recognised at 28 Kim Kardashian and Kylie Jenner 'will star in the video for Tyga and Kanye collaboration Feel Me' Both will both star in the video for Tyga and Kanye Ashlee Simpson steps out with husband Evan Ross and daughter Jagger... as her father Joe begins radiation therapy for prostate cancer Smiling Val Kilmer looks healthier as he makes rare appearance... months after denying he has throat cancer Repeatedly denies it Mariah Carey puts her curves on display as she takes twins Moroccan and Monroe to The Lego Batman Movie premiere Brought her five-year-old twins PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Joaquin Phoenix and Rooney Mara are seen together for the first time since finding love onset Met on Mary Magdalene Beach babe!
